# Hyperbolic model

```{r}
#load ggpairs
library(GGally)
#load data
load("data/derived/fit_ML_hyperbolic.RData")
ggpairs(dat_tmp[dat_tmp$trial==1,names(dat_tmp) %in% c("k","sigma")])
```

